channel.title: CVE Feed for Ex-Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ex-Themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47324|2024-10-07T14:40:45.117Z -- ex-themes -- wp%20timeline%20%E2%80%93%20vertical%20and%20horizontal%20timeline%20plugin
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Ex-Themes WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin: from n/a through 3.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-47323|2024-10-07T14:41:59.771Z -- ex-themes -- wp%20timeline%20%E2%80%93%20vertical%20and%20horizontal%20timeline%20plugin
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Ex-Themes WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin: from n/a through 3.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-47322|2024-10-06T11:17:56.834Z -- ex-themes -- wp%20timeline%20%E2%80%93%20vertical%20and%20horizontal%20timeline%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ex-Themes WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin: from n/a through 3.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-8671|2024-09-24T15:34:14.805Z -- ex-themes -- wooevents%20-%20calendar%20and%20event%20booking
item.description: The WooEvents - Calendar and Event Booking plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file overwrite due to insufficient file path validation in the inc/barcode.php file in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to overwrite arbitrary files on the server, which can easily lead to remote code execution when the right file is deleted (such as wp-config.php).

item.title: CVE-2024-8671|2024-09-24T03:06:37.586Z -- ex-themes -- wooevents%20-%20calendar%20and%20event%20booking
item.description: The WooEvents - Calendar and Event Booking plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file overwrite due to insufficient file path validation in the inc/barcode.php file in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to overwrite arbitrary files on the server, which can easily lead to remote code execution when the right file is deleted (such as wp-config.php).
